name: Skill Point
summary: Skill Point is a fast-paced VR game that challenges your reflexes, accuracy, and focus through a series of short, skill-based mini-games. Each playthrough gives you 7 randomized challenges — from catching and throwing to memory, balance, and precision tasks. With easy-to-learn mechanics and tight timing, every session tests how well you perform under pressure. The faster and cleaner your execution, the more points you earn.
